Headers With Style

No Header

Feeling Responsive hola hola allows you to use all kinds of headers. This example shows no header at all. Just the navigation.

Silence is beautiful. Sometimes you just want no distractions at all. Whether you like the content to speak for itself or enjoy pure typography on a plain background: Feeling Responsive got you covered. Just say no like this:

header: no

All Header-Styles

Include file ‘list-posts.html tag=’header’’ contains invalid characters or sequences


»Feeling Responsive« is a responsive theme for Jekyll based on the fabulous foundation framework with beautiful typography and a bright color palette.

  • Created with ♥ by Phlow with Jekyll using Feeling Responsive
